channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown vegetation on path/way problem, 21st October
item.description:
Customer reports that the PROW at the location is overgrown: the nettles and thistles are up to waist height. Furthermore, where the brook is, where the style used to be (pinned on the map), the rails on both sides have now fallen on the concrete base.
Report on FixMyStreet
